summary: This document is an email chain from June 2019 arranging a meeting to discuss the plan for the Epstein case. The participants appear to be from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: The email is sent from his office address (USANYS) and the meeting is to discuss the Epstein case plan.

events.title: Meeting to discuss Epstein case plan
events.description: A meeting is scheduled at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to discuss the plan for the Epstein case.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office, SDNY (7th floor office)
keyFacts: The email chain is dated June 2019, after Epstein's 2019 arrest, indicating ongoing case planning.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The subject is explicitly "Epstein matter" and the purpose is to discuss "the plan for the Epstein case."
One participant was in El Salvador during the planning.
The meeting was scheduled to take place in a 7th-floor office at the SDNY.
